content:
# It appears that the attempt to locate and move to a stone patch has not yielded any results, similar to the previous attempts with iron ore and coal. 
# This indicates that there may be no resources available in the immediate vicinity.

# To proceed, we should explore the environment more broadly to identify any resource patches. 
# Let’s use a function to scan for all available resource patches in the area.

# We will check for all resource patches without specifying a particular type, which will give us a better understanding of what is available.

print(scan_for_resources())  # Attempt to scan for all available resources in the vicinity.
